value.title: StarCraft 2: Gumiho's BATTLECRUISERS Surprise Astrea!
value.excerpt: Best-of-3 series from the Korean StarCraft League between Astrea (Protoss) and GuMiho (Terran). A very cheesy start catches Astrea off guard, but his quick Sentry rush helps him survive
